page.title: 02CHILDREN'S GAMES (contd)
page.content:
Once you're in you can't get out Unless you turn around, Once you're in you can't get out Unless you do the splits, Once you're in you can't get out Unless you count to six Twice you're in etc.continue up to 10
STONES First you get 4 or 5 stones and pile them up. We play 4 people, 2 each team. One of the team throws the ball at the stones to knock them down. When you've knocked them down you run while the other team get the ball but they can't run with it so they pass it to each other and try to hit the opposite team with it. Meanwhile the other team try to pile the stones up. If they do without getting hit they shout "STONES". You carry on till they hit you, then you change over.
